content: And I think that having the steady and diversified activity that we're seeing on manufacturing is good both for us, for a manufacturing -- well, maybe it's a little bit more difficult for our colleagues in manufacturing because it's a lot easier to just build one or two car types as opposed to eight different car types, but it does provide us a lot of benefits in the lease fleet that we're building to make certain that we've got good diversity, good quality customers, and it's good for our operating lessor customers and our syndication partners who are also looking for diversity in the equipment that they buy from us.
